name: SleepNoiseSummer
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep noise summer
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Noise Summer lets you reproduce chilling summer inspired audio tracks audio tracks that will make you feel like you're on vacation again. Listen to this skill if you seek some relax and chilling vibes.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill.
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
Click + to add a new routine.
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
Choose "Your Skills".
Select this skill.
Click Next.
Choose Device to perform the routine to.
Click Save.

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram!
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
